attributes.action: Requesting a government review of Facebook community standards
attributes.additional_details:
We request an urgent government intercession and review of Facebook community standards.
Why should pictures of breastfeeding mothers and injured soldiers be removed by FB moderators, when they blatantly permit vile beheading videos, pictures and videos of dead babies, hate groups aimed at non Muslims and many other disgusting groups.
Facebooks double standards and hypocricy are tantamount to incitement of hatred and racism against non Muslims.
